title: #184 - Racism and Cities with Mabel O. Wilson, Akira Drake Rodriguez, and Bryan Lee
itunes:title: #184 - Racism and Cities with Mabel O. Wilson, Akira Drake Rodriguez, and Bryan Lee
description:
Mabel O Wilson is a Professor and the Associate Director of the Institute for Research in African American Studies at Columbia University within the GSAPP.

Bryan Lee is a Design Principal of Colloqate and a national Design Justice Advocate.

Akira Drake Rodriguez is a Lecturer at the University of Pennsylvania’s Weitzman School of Design and School of Social Policy & Practice.

The Midnight Charette is now The Second Studio.

content:encoded:
Mabel O Wilson is a Professor and the Associate Director of the Institute for Research in African American Studies at Columbia University within the GSAPP.

Bryan Lee is a Design Principal of Colloqate and a national Design Justice Advocate.

Akira Drake Rodriguez is a Lecturer at the University of Pennsylvania’s Weitzman School of Design and School of Social Policy & Practice.

The Midnight Charette is now The Second Studio.

itunes:subtitle: Blackness and Whiteness, key changes needed for a more equitable society, protests, monuments, and more
itunes:author: David Lee and Marina Bourderonnet
